thread.section_title: Maison Souquet - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Ambiance par exellence!
thread.title_full: Ambiance par exellence! - Review of Maison Souquet, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: clifford b
title: Ambiance par exellence!
text:
What a wonderful find!... a sumptuously decorated hotel room with impeccable service. The junior suites are bigger than your average hotel room in Paris and the Salons downstairs, covered in red velvet, made for a memorable, romantic stay.
Also, the breakfast and service are first class.
Room Tip: we stayed in the rooms away from the street, very quiet See more room tips
